author: Kevin Spivey
comment: I'm using iCountTimer Pro version. Works perfectly so I can repeat the stretches and exercises that I've learned in Physical Therapy for back pain.

author: Dan Millett
comment: Great app for timing stretches.  I wish I could adjust the rest time in less than 5 minute increments though.

reply.author: RhythmicWorks
reply.content:
Yes, you can adjust timing in less than 5 second increments using the numpad input method. Tap on the value to enter your custom time. 

If you need any help, do let us know. You can email support via the app or update this review.

author: Mauro Capolino
comment: Does not save preference

reply.author: RhythmicWorks
reply.content: Hi. We replied to your "presets" concern via email. Are you facing any issues with preferences as well?

author: Rohit Phadatare
comment: Best gym buddy.....download fast...gym lovers.

author: Stoycho Bozukov
comment: I love it!

author: Jim Allegood
comment: I use iCountTimer every time that I workout at the gym, but I would like to have the option for time remaining prompts during the the rest period instead of just the last 8 seconds, then I could just leave my phone in my pocket, during the set.

reply.author: RhythmicWorks
reply.content: Thanks for the review :) When would you like the app to prompt during rest time? Should the last 8 seconds be adjustable? You can also email us using the in-app feedback in preferences.

title: Great Gym Companion

author: John Palmer
comment: I only have simple needs and it keeps it simple. More to explore should I need to

author: Jeannie Ramirez
comment: I love this app. By far it is better than any other I have tried in the last few weeks. It helps me push harder. I no longer have to focus on counting reps either.

author: Edward Tivrusky
comment: I love having this app do my counting for me so it is accurate and I don't lose track.

reply.author: RhythmicWorks
reply.content:
Now you can save your timers/counters as presets. Just tap on the label button near the total time on timer/counter screen, name the preset and save it. That's it. It would be available on the presets screen. If you need any additional help, feel free to contact support.

Update: Thank you for the review :)

title: Great counter app

author: Brad S Cooper
comment: I use this app for HIIT training.  It's awesome and I upgraded when it went on sale for higher interval options. I had hoped the presets allowed a day of week and a set of exercises. Just program click start on the day and the timer would show the next activity and announce. No luck.  Presets are not useful.  Only worth buying just for the higher interval options. May still ask for refund and try another app. Love the timer graphics and sequences though.

reply.author: RhythmicWorks
reply.content:
Glad that you like the app and use it for HIIT. 'Start by day' is a nice feature to have. We will see if we can have it in iCountTimer while still maintaining its simplicity or else we could have it in a more comprehensive app which is a ‘work in progress’ at the moment.

Thanks for your feedback and for supporting us by getting the Pro version :)

title: Wanted more but fair price on sale

author: Bill Harley
comment: The free is OK to start, but you have a lot more options on the paid version.
title: Great counting app

author: Dave Peters
comment: I have BPPV (vertigo) and regularly perform the Epley procedure to control it. This requires 3 rounds of a 5 step procedure and this app talks me through the entire 7.5 minute routine without missing a beat. Once you learn how to program it, you'll wonder how you got along without it. Good job devs!
title: Perfect, once you learn it's capabilities

author: Hitesh Mahant
comment: It had inbuilt Music Player.. or existing one can be internally triggered/accessed. :-)
title: Very Nice App..wished..

author: Ray Stroinski
comment: Great App!

author: Steve Slatky
comment: Well the problem I had below was fixed within a day. Very surprised by that. So it shows the devs care about this app. And it does exactly what it says. This is a great workout buddy app.    I had a timer preset for 4 minutes of work with 2 minute break. Every time I open the preset it resets the work to 2 minutes. This makes the app for me pretty much useless. I am not going to set the interval every time I want to do it.

reply.author: RhythmicWorks
reply.content: The issue has been fixed and the update is available. Kindly update your app and thanks for letting us know :)

author: Eric Mullen
comment: 5 stars - best and most versatile timer app I have used.  If you mix up your workouts and need a flexible solution to keep time, reps and more - download this now!

reply.author: RhythmicWorks
reply.content: Yes, now we have the volume control :)

title: Well done

author: Andrew Sayer
comment: An extremely professional app. Was very surprised on how well it is built. Customer service is very responsive and friendly. Does exactly what you need it to do in a very effective manner. 5 stars!!
title: Great for workouts

author: Püschl József
comment: Works perfectly.

reply.author: RhythmicWorks
reply.content: The issue has been resolved. Thanks for reporting it.

author: Y B
comment: Loved the new look
title: Great

author: Chonnagan Hiranphan
comment: I want to more feature, I can not edit my preset.

reply.author: RhythmicWorks
reply.content: Your request has been completed. Now you can edit your presets.

author: Kevin Chan
comment: Despite already having a "full" version for free thanks to AppGratis, I bought this "pro" version to support the developer as the app was working well. However, as with other users, I found it badly needed support for presets, hence I only gave it 4 stars previously. I'm glad the developer has now addressed the request from multiple users (instead of focusing on small, individual requests that break the reliability of the app), and it's my pleasure to give it 5 stars.

reply.author: RhythmicWorks
reply.content: Thanks for your kind gesture :) Sorry for the delay. Its a much needed and very useful feature and we will try to implement it as early as possible. **Update: We are happy to let you know that the support for presets has been added.

title: Now Worthy of 5 Stars

author: Cláudia Sofia Simões
comment: Love this app! But will give it 5 stars if there's the option to save each counter or timer settings. I have different workouts, which require different number of counts and different periods of rest. If I can save each setting with the name of each workout that would be spot on! Thanks! *** update *** Thank you for including presets! I'm really happy with this app. Keep going!

reply.author: RhythmicWorks
reply.content: Greetings! Now you can save each timer or counter settings as presets with a name. Hope you find this feature useful. Thanks!

title: Amazing

author: Suraj Jadhav
comment: The ease with which I can set my exercises is awesome. Great work!
title: Truly elegant and helpful

author: George San Miguel
title: Would be nice to have the number of cycles done

author: Prashant More
comment: At last received a timer that I was looking for since quiet long. Perfect for interval / circuit trainings. Helps you keep up pace even when doing exercise alone. You can set your intervals, your rest time according to your fitness level. Helps me in avoiding unnecessary wastage of time in between exercises.  Helps you like a trainer. Definitely recommended. Worth more than what's charged. Thanks team. Keep it up.
title: Absolutely Perfect App

author: Leandrew Emery
comment: I really like this timer app. Very customizable especially for exercising, though I don't exercise much these days, but I can definitely use this timer for cooking purposes and other tasks like drills. Just been playing with it today for some work tasks and I'll definitely will be using this for drills with students. Well done and thank you for the introductory discount.
title: Great Timer app!!

author: Neil Carpenter
comment: Any chance of making it continue to run when I use my phone for something else, otherwise it just pauses.

reply.author: RhythmicWorks
reply.content: We are happy to let you know that now iCountTimer runs in background :)

title: Not bad, good timings and features.

author: Another Zen
comment: For me, it seems more logical to count every rep with the voice. If i set it to 4 counts(reps) i would like to hear 1, 2, 3, 4. or perhaps Start/Go, 2,3,4. so the start is not confused with the count down. As it is now, it seems that it doesn't count the last count/rep when i set it to 4 and all i hear is Start, 1, 2, 3.. Some people perhaps like it this way tho, so perhaps a toggle to use start as 1 and go directly to 2?  Other than that, it's pretty great :)

reply.author: RhythmicWorks
reply.content: Wanted to let you know that the counter now supports various counting options: count before/after repetition. *Update: We thank you for your inputs on the counting mode and after a year and a half we have seen many people like using the pre count mode which you had suggested. Thanks again!

title: Good, but one question

author: koustubh gaikwad
comment: Great app, beautiful design and easy to use. Good job!
title: Simple, useful and covenient

author: Chirag Jadhav
comment: I never used apps in my workouts...But this one is seducing me to..I like its simplicity.
title: Awesome app

author: Janak Tamhane
comment: Beautiful design. I like the counter. I have a question. How to change the background?

reply.author: RhythmicWorks
reply.content: **Update: To change the background, tap and hold 'Settings' button on main screen. Check the in-app help for more features.

title: Great!

author: Karan Jadhav
comment: I can use it for my yoga. And my home workout.
title: Nice
